title: Project-Based Analytical Skills Development Program for Pre-Service Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of introductory educational theory and social studies teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning utilizing digital devices in blended (synchronous/asynchronous) online environments

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can apply the analysis stages of the Discovery Learning (DL), Interactive Demonstration (ID), and Inquiry Learning (IL) models with over 80% accuracy when designing social studies lessons
Can demonstrate critical thinking skills in solving complex social problems through team-based project execution
Can systematically document analytical decision-making processes at each stage of instructional design using digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
